review: In all honesty, could I say the writing in this book is the best I've ever read? No definitely not but, the reason I gave this book five stars is that it really opened my mind up to some things I've never thought about. I finished this book in about four hours and was filled with happiness and sadness.
name: Maddie Sachs

review: I was hooked by page 8! The most beautifully written, nobody could ever do it better. If you are looking for a book with passion, excitement, sadness, anger, disappointment, lots of love and suspense this is the book to read! I could not contain myself the whole time of reading itâ€¦ absolutely breathtaking! The ending actually brought me to tears, my new all time favourite book. Anyone to ask me for a recommendation this will be the first.
name: Valerie Cartagena

review: This book is absolutely heartbreaking, unforgettable, and amazing. I am only writing this review for 2 reasons 1 to tell everyone what a great book this and to give thanks to colleen she does an amazing job with all her books.
name: Livsey Keg

review: I devoured this book in literally, no exaggeration, six hours. I spent six hours straight just eating up the content of this book. And I think it's safe to say those six hours changed my life.This book holds everything you need, love, death, emotion, humor, awareness, pain and much more and I highly recommend this fantastic book.
name: Ireeze Charlz Marcelo

review: Colleen adressed different issues in this book but the main was about domestic abuse. I respect her, for she placed the readers in perception of both the victim and third person. It is imperative to do so as it reminded us that heavy undone decisions could only be understood by the person in situation; and that heavy undone decisions aren't applicable and easy as it sounds to some affairs.
name: Gemma Diehl

review: This is actually my first book by Colleen and also my first book on domestic violence.At first few chapters I actually fell in love with Ryle and loved how open he was with his words. I love people who dare to say things they want outly, I guess that made me love him even more.
name: Steffy George
